mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWTABLE (IDX, MEMBERID, PRODUCTID, TITLE, CONTENT, FILENAME, PWD, REGDATE, READHIT, JOAYO) VALUES(SEQ_Review.nextVal, #{memberid}, #{productid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{filename}, #{pwd}, SYSDATE, 0, 0)
mapper.delete: delete from reviewtable where idx=#{idx} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.update: update reviewtable set readhit = readhit + 1 where idx = #{idx}
